sentences: He is currently the longest serving bassist for the Melvins.
Both Warren and Willis joined the Melvins in January 2006 and appear on (A) Senile Animal as well as 2008's Nude with Boots and 2010's album The Bride Screamed Murder.
Warren was previously a member of bands Karp, Tight Bros from Way Back When, White Shit, and The Whip.
In 2020, Warren participated in a long form career spanning interview on Conan Neutron's Protonic Reversal, speaking about the Whip reissues, Big Business, his time with the Melvins and much more.
